Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In this study , neurocognitive outcomes and neuroradiologic evidence of leukoencephalopathy were compared in children treated with intense central nervous system ( CNS ) - directed therapy ( P9605 ) versus those receiving fewer CNS - directed treatment days during intensive consolidation ( P9201 ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| leukoencephalopathy |

Explanation:

The word "leukoencephalopathy" is the only disease term mentioned in the paragraph. It is a medical condition characterized by changes in the white matter of the brain. The other terms mentioned, such as "neurocognitive outcomes" and "central nervous system (CNS)-directed therapy," refer to aspects of medical treatment or evaluation rather than specific diseases.
